verses.text: And if his \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offering|strong="H8002"\w*, if he \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \add it\add* of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*; whether \add it be\add* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* or \w female|strong="H5347"\w*, he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the peace \w offering|strong="H8002"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*,\f + \fr 3.3 \ft fat: or, suet\f*

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* on them, which \add is\add* by the \w flanks|strong="H3689"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, with the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, it shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft caul…: or, midriff over the liver, and over the kidneys\f*

And \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* it on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* upon the burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, which \add is\add* upon the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* that \add is\add* on the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \add it is\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And if his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* for a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offering|strong="H8002"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*; \w male|strong="H2145"\w* or \w female|strong="H5347"\w*, he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

If he \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H3775"\w* for his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, then shall he \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the peace \w offering|strong="H8002"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* thereof, \add and\add* the \w whole|strong="H8549"\w* \w rump|strong="H0451"\w*, it shall he take \w off|strong="H5493"\w* \w hard|strong="H5980"\w* by the \w backbone|strong="H6096"\w*; and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*,

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon them, which \add is\add* by the \w flanks|strong="H3689"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, with the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, it shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* it upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \add it is\add* the \w food|strong="H3899"\w* of the offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And if his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, then he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he shall \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of it, and \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* thereof his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, \add even\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*,

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* upon them, which \add is\add* by the \w flanks|strong="H3689"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, with the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, it shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* them upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \add it is\add* the \w food|strong="H3899"\w* of the offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*: all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\add It shall be\add* a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* throughout all your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*, that ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* neither \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* nor \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.
